
       Name: Test case 5
Description: Test mock call count error
       File: testdata/errors-example/case5.yaml

Request:
     Method: GET
       Path: /json
      Query: 
       Body:
<no body>

Response:
     Status: 200 OK
       Body:
{"somefield":123}


     Result: ERRORS!

Errors:

1) mock 'subservice': at path '$': number of 'calls' does not match:
     expected: 1
       actual: 0
